name: Devil May Network
description:
CONTROLS:

  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Interact, Click and Hold to pan camera
  • SCROLL WHEEL - Zoom in and out

You, a human, are a new hire at a Hell-based company.  It's really like any other office job—the key to moving up is who you know.

And the company-sponsored annual Holiday Party is the best opportunity to network!

Mingle with your coworkers and collect business cards to advance your career.  You'll be rubbing shoulders with fiends from every level of the company, including C-suite executives... and if you play your cards right, you might even meet the CEO.

Is there anything more hellish than networking? It turns out there is:  networking in Hell.
